data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heiss, Ernst (2013): Annotated checklist of the flat bug family Aradidae Brullé, 1836 from East Africa (Hemiptera, Heteroptera). Zootaxa 3718 (4): 331-344, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3718.4.3
